bcl:section.bcl:text: Sections 903 (5) and 917 of the Local Government Act apply to the Corporation of the Township of Langley, in relation to the entire geographic area of that municipality, on and after July 28, 1997.
Sections 903 (5) and 917 of the Local Government Act apply to the City of Abbotsford, in relation to the entire geographic area of the municipality, on and after July 19, 1999.

Sections 903 (5) and 917 of the Local Government Act apply to the council of The Corporation of Delta, in relation to the entire geographic area of that municipality, on and after the date this section takes effect.

Sections 903 (5) and 917 of the Local Government Act apply to council of The City of Kelowna, in relation to the entire geographic area of that municipality, on and after the date this section takes effect.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Local Government Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 323, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 918]
